subject: RE: [junit] Re: JUnit & Reflection -  now Clean ClassLoader Environment for Tests.
msgSnippet: Hi Neil, Thanks, Will take a look at it tomorrow in work! Oisin
messageBody:
Hi Neil,

Thanks, Will take a look at it tomorrow in work!

Oisin

> > which was written and didn't behave as it was expected to, I've
> > inherited this code, its used to proved a clean classloader
> > environment to tests, so that test methods have clean
> static instances
> > for every test run.
> >
